message.body: you awake?
yep, are you?
sorat
...sort of
its late, why tired?
Im alright, even went running this morning
didnt sleep great tho
how come?
I dunno, was up late
my sleep schedule is all messed up
well go to bed earlier!
what do you even do staying up that late?
well last night the band came over to set up and played a few songs
then Mike and I were watching the football game and talked to barry for a bit
since whenm do you watch football?
I've always watched on occasion
besides the cowboys were getting their asses beat so thats always good
agreed
how's your sister?
good? i suppose. Havnt talked to her in a few days, why?
is she still in school?
hanging on
if she gets her shit together
Raf is thinking of hiring someone part time
shes doing better this semester from what she tells me, although math is still questionable
yea?
doing what?
mainly office work, data entry, filing type stuff
maybe more if she is good and interested
Does she work part time at happy harry's?
hmmm, how many hours a week? shes working at happy harrys now, but only 2 days a week to try and focus on her school work
so shed have to leave there if she were to consider it
how many classes is she taking?
4--shes full time
yeah its hard to say how much he would need her. It would depend on how busy we were and how fast she is
I know Jen isn't putting very many hrs in at this point
i mean, i can say something to her, but i have a feeling my parents are going to be resistant because they dont even really want her working in the first place because her schoolwork is sub par
what would he pay her?
prob could start her at $8 and go to $10 based on performance. Not sure what shes making at happy harrys
The nice thing is it is flexible, as you may have noticed
the hours at delgado appraisal that is
haha
thats a nice way of putting it
ill tell her about it and see what she thinks---im sure itll have to go through parental approval tho too cause my parents are obsessed with her doing better in school
There would be some structure involved im sure, but it is flexible in the sense that if she needed off it wouldnt be a problem. its more about keeping up with the paperwork and all
My cousin wanted to know it she would be able to do a good job, since he doesnt know her
i gotcha. she goes to school every day of the week too though
i mean, im sure she would. she does well at her 'job' now, but shes never done paperwork filing and such
theres not much filing really, the majority of her job would be inputting reports into a program we use. Its relatively simple, but can be tedious if your doing it too long
i hear ya. well would she be able to work weekends as opposed to throughout the week, cause thats what shes working now
it doesnt really matter in some ways, but I think he would prefer her working at least some time during the week
are most of her classes during the day?
all of them
well run it by her and see if shes interested. Raf can talk to you about any details and such
ideally I think he would like someone to come in for a few hrs here and there to keep up with the data entry and filing
gotcha--ill let you know what she says :)
k, let me know if you have any questions
will dooo
are you actually working today?
yea I am
I work everyday
pshh
it sucks. its so nice out and Im stuck in the office. I was hoping to make it up to upstate pa as some point
